title: Workshop on Strengthening Consistency in Outcome-Based Science Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Secondary Science Education and Leadership Competencies as an Administrator
context.additional_context: Strengthening the operational capacity of educational programs aimed at improving science-related job performance

learning_goals: Explain systematic methods for aligning course learning outcomes (CLOs) with program learning outcomes (PLOs)
Apply an evaluation model using mathematical tools (matrices, weights) for consistency analysis between learning outcomes
Diagnose learning outcome misalignment issues in actual science education cases and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
